title: Meter room shall be provided as per the requirement of M
clause_text: Meter room shall be provided as per the requirement of M.S.E.D.C.L. or power supply company as per the number of tenements / units.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Meter room shall be provided as per the requirement of M.S.E.D.C.L. or power supply company as per the number of tenements / units.
